thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: William
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by William

author: William
title: William
text: I have now used Brian Gavin Diamonds (BGD)) twice to purchase jewelry for my wedding anniversary gift to my wife, but this is my first time reviewing them. Both times the jewelry pieces purchased were on point quality wise. My wife loves both them!!! However, the reason why I am now writing a review is to mention the consistent excellent custom service I received both times when shopping for jewelry. Jamie was very helpful and provided great recommendations when I was trying to pick out a piece for my wife.
